verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> The heavens <S%H8064><s%> declare <S%H5608><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of God; <S%H410><s%> and the firmament <S%H7549><s%> shows <S%H5046><s%> his handiwork. <S%H4639><s%> <S%H3027><s%>
Day <S%H3117><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> utters <S%H5042><s%> speech, <S%H562><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> to night <S%H3915><s%> shows <S%H2331><s%> knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>
There is no <S%H369><s%> speech <S%H562><s%> nor <S%H369><s%> language, <S%H1697><s%> where their voice <S%H6963><s%> is not heard. <S%H8085><s%>

Their line <S%H6957><s%> is gone <S%H3318><s%> out through all <S%H3605><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and their words <S%H4405><s%> to the end <S%H7097><s%> of the world. <S%H8398><s%> In them has he set <S%H7760><s%> a tabernacle <S%H168><s%> for the sun, <S%H8121><s%>
Which is as a bridegroom <S%H2860><s%> coming <S%H3318><s%> out of his chamber, <S%H2646><s%> and rejoices <S%H7797><s%> as a strong <S%H1368><s%> man to run <S%H7323><s%> a race. <S%H734><s%>

His going <S%H4161><s%> forth <S%H4161><s%> is from the end <S%H7097><s%> of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and his circuit <S%H8622><s%> to the ends <S%H7098><s%> of it: and there is nothing <S%H369><s%> hid <S%H5641><s%> from the heat <S%H2535><s%> thereof.

The law <S%H8451><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is perfect, <S%H8549><s%> converting <S%H7725><s%> the soul: <S%H5315><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is sure, <S%H539><s%> making wise <S%H2449><s%> the simple. <S%H6612><s%>

The statutes <S%H6490><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are right, <S%H3477><s%> rejoicing <S%H8055><s%> the heart: <S%H3820><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is pure, <S%H1249><s%> enlightening <S%H215><s%> the eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

The fear <S%H3374><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is clean, <S%H2889><s%> enduring <S%H5975><s%> for ever: <S%H5703><s%> the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are true <S%H571><s%> and righteous <S%H6663><s%> altogether. <S%H3162><s%>

More to be desired <S%H2530><s%> are they than gold, <S%H2091><s%> yes, than much <S%H7227><s%> fine gold: <S%H6337><s%> sweeter <S%H4966><s%> also than honey <S%H1706><s%> and the honeycomb. <S%H5317><s%> <S%H6688><s%>
Moreover <S%H1571><s%> by them is your servant <S%H5650><s%> warned: <S%H2094><s%> and in keeping <S%H8104><s%> of them there is great <S%H7227><s%> reward. <S%H6118><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can understand <S%H995><s%> his errors? <S%H7691><s%> cleanse <S%H5352><s%> you me from secret <S%H5641><s%> faults.

Keep <S%H2820><s%> back <S%H2820><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> from presumptuous <S%H2086><s%> sins; let them not have dominion <S%H4910><s%> over me: then <S%H227><s%> shall I be upright, <S%H8552><s%> and I shall be innocent <S%H5352><s%> from the great <S%H7227><s%> transgression. <S%H6588><s%>

Let the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and the meditation <S%H1902><s%> of my heart, <S%H3820><s%> be acceptable <S%H7522><s%> in your sight, <S%H6440><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> my strength, <S%H6697><s%> and my redeemer. <S%H1350><s%>
